about.title: About me
about.description: Passionate Front-end Developer focused on creating interactive, scalable, and high-performance digital experiences. I have solid experience in challenging projects, using modern technologies like React.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Swiper, as well as knowledge in Python and UX/UI Design. I am an enthusiast in building reusable components, creating intuitive interfaces, and constantly improving the performance and accessibility of applications. I always seek to enhance the user experience, offering innovative and efficient solutions.
